head.supplied: Melbourne, ¶ 16/8/79. ¶ W. H. Odgers Esqr. ¶ Undersecretary. ¶ Sir,...

div.p: P79/7461, unit 1097, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

In accordance with your request of Circular 3211
See W. Odgers to M, 29 July 1879. I have the honor to submit herewith the return of the Salaries and Wages expended in my Department during the quarters ending 31 March 1877, 1878 & 1879.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Department of the Government Botanist
List written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.
